ResumeParserData.Experience: HSBC Bank Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2018 - Present  Leading a team of analysts responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on PEPs and high-risk clients. Implementing and overseeing risk assessment frameworks to ensure compliance with AML regulations. Key Achievements :   Successfully streamlined the EDD process, reducing assessment time by 20%.  Led high-profile investigations, significantly reducing the bank's exposure to financial crime.  Developed and delivered training programs for junior analysts, enhancing team capability and performance.  Santander UK PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2013 - 2018  Conducted detailed due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients and PEPs. Collaborated with compliance and legal teams to ensure regulatory adherence and risk mitigation.  Key Responsibilities :   Performed comprehensive EDD on high-risk clients, documenting findings and recommendations.  Analyzed transaction patterns to identify potential money laundering activities.  Prepared and presented detailed reports to senior management and regulatory bodies.  Assisted in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures.  Barclays Bank AML Analyst  Manchester, UK  2011 - 2013  Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence on clients and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.  Key Contributions :   Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients to identify potential AML risks.  Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports and presentations.  Participated in the development of AML training programs for staff.  Monitored client transactions, identifying and reporting suspicious activities.

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Leading a team of analysts responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on PEPs and high-risk clients. Implementing and overseeing risk assessment frameworks to ensure compliance with AML regulations. 
 
 Key Achievements : 
 Successfully streamlined the EDD process, reducing assessment time by 20%. 
 Led high-profile investigations, significantly reducing the bank's exposure to financial crime. 
 Developed and delivered training programs for junior analysts, enhancing team capability and performance.

JobProfile.Title: PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Conducted detailed due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients and PEPs. Collaborated with compliance and legal teams to ensure regulatory adherence and risk mitigation. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Performed comprehensive EDD on high-risk clients, documenting findings and recommendations. 
 Analyzed transaction patterns to identify potential money laundering activities. 
 Prepared and presented detailed reports to senior management and regulatory bodies. 
 Assisted in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures.

JobProfile.Title: AML Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: anti-money-laundering- analyst, analyst, anti money laundering compliance, aml investigator, analyst aml compliance, analyst anti-money laundering, analyst of anti money laundering, analyst, aml compliance, analyst, aml compl risk management, fraud and aml analyst, analyst - aml compliance, analyst, aml investigations, anti-money laundering analyst, aml compliance analyst, aml surveillance analyst, aml analyst, analyst anti money laundering, aml investigations specialist

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence on clients and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies. 
 Key Contributions : 
 Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients to identify potential AML risks. 
 Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports and presentations. 
 Participated in the development of AML training programs for staff. 
 Monitored client transactions, identifying and reporting suspicious activities.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Seasoned PEP & High Risk Analyst with over 12 years of experience in the banking sector. Expertise in conducting enhanced due diligence, managing high-risk client portfolios, and ensuring compliance with AML regulations. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a proven track record of mitigating financial crime risks.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Sophie has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Financial Analysts and Advisors. 'The candidate has a total experience of 12 YearsThe candidate has been working as a Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst at HSBC Bank for the last 6.7 years.

Sophie Collins

Professional Summary : 
Seasoned PEP & High Risk Analyst with over 12 years of experience in the banking sector. Expertise in conducting enhanced due diligence, managing high-risk client portfolios, and ensuring compliance with AML regulations. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a proven track record of mitigating financial crime risks.

Education : 
University of Manchester (Russell Group) 
MSc Financial Crime and Compliance, Distinction
Graduated : 2011
University of Sheffield (Russell Group) 
BSc Criminology and Finance, Upper Second Class Honours
Graduated : 2009

Professional Experience : 
HSBC Bank Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst
Manchester, UK
2018 - Present
Leading a team of analysts responsible for conducting enhanced due diligence on PEPs and high-risk clients. Implementing and overseeing risk assessment frameworks to ensure compliance with AML regulations.
Key Achievements : 
Successfully streamlined the EDD process, reducing assessment time by 20%.
Led high-profile investigations, significantly reducing the bank's exposure to financial crime.
Developed and delivered training programs for junior analysts, enhancing team capability and performance.
Santander UK PEP & High Risk Analyst
Manchester, UK
2013 - 2018
Conducted detailed due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients and PEPs. Collaborated with compliance and legal teams to ensure regulatory adherence and risk mitigation.
Key Responsibilities : 
Performed comprehensive EDD on high-risk clients, documenting findings and recommendations.
Analyzed transaction patterns to identify potential money laundering activities.
Prepared and presented detailed reports to senior management and regulatory bodies.
Assisted in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures.
Barclays Bank AML Analyst
Manchester, UK
2011 - 2013
Supported the AML compliance team by conducting due diligence on clients and monitoring transactions for suspicious activities. Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.
Key Contributions : 
Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients to identify potential AML risks.
Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports and presentations.
Participated in the development of AML training programs for staff.
Monitored client transactions, identifying and reporting suspicious activities.
